description: Creates a recovery group in an account. A recovery group corresponds to an application and includes a list of the cells that make up the application.

parameters.name: Cells
parameters.description: A list of the cell Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the recovery group. (string) ---

parameters.name: RecoveryGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the recovery group to create.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Cells
nested_items.description: A list of a cell's Amazon Resource Names (ARNs).

nested_items.name: RecoveryGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the recovery group.

nested_items.name: RecoveryGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the recovery group.
